issue.title: [CF 992] Global Group Showing Despite Group Conditions
issue.body:
http://puu.sh/bexbA/4b96f39d15.jpg

The group of warrior icons at the top left have a group condition that should only pass as true and show the group if the unit class (unit=player) is a warrior, yet its showing on my monk.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #992 | Raw

comments.body:
Seems to be working OK for me. Remember that group conditions don't apply while in config mode, if that's what the issue is.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

The fact it doesn't work in config mode is probably it. Was giving me one of those "Regenerate GUID" things so I assume it might be causing issues behind the scenes.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy
